Text: Can anybody tell me what exactly this is?

It's probably the BBC America special 'Doctor Who Rewind' that recaps season 5.
http://press.bbcamerica.com/program-highlights.jsp?id=26651

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0436992/episodes#season-6

That one is S06E00, not this one, this is different.

Leon, you don't know what you're talking about. Any special outside of the storyline is e00. The typical Christmas specials tend to also be considered e00 too, e00 is a bit arbitrary here and as specified at imdb for the xmas special.
The bbc doesn't give this nor xmas specials an official episode number as far as I know.
